original_text: After Job had prayed for his friends, the Lord restored his fortunes and gave him twice as much as he had before.
korean_text: 욥이 그의 친구들을 위하여 기도할 때 여호와께서 욥의 곤경을 돌이키시고 여호와께서 욥에게 이전 모든 소유보다 갑절이나 주신지라

sentences.original_text: After Job had prayed for his friends
and gave him twice as much as he had before
sentences.korean_translation: 그에게 이전보다 두 배나 더 주셨다
